attr.title: SAD GOD
attr.desc: We invite you to descend into a pit of monsters and traps. Gain strength from coins and weapons from altars. Touch an orb. Then race to the surface before the lava gets you.
attr.inst: Purchase on itch.io (https://st33d.itch.io/sad-god), download, extract, and copy sadgod.exe to the sadgod port fodler.
attr.inst_md: Purchase on [itch.io](https://st33d.itch.io/sad-god), download, extract, and copy `sadgod.exe` to the `sadgod` port fodler.
